short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple tool for recognizing handwritten Japanese characters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Intelligent JP recognizes handwritten Japanese characters, including hiragana, katakana, and kanji.  It allows users to write out full Japanese sentences entirely by drawing.

Simply draw a character in the canvas window, and Intelligent JP will use a convolutional neural network to accurately recognize it.  Hovering over the character shows the definition and clicking it writes it to the text field.  When you finish, Intelligent JP allows you to copy your phrase to the clipboard.

Intelligent JP is fast and simple, perfect for novice and fluent speakers alike!


Version 0.1.1:
Reduced size and fixed some definitions.
